description: AWS Route53 Recovery Control Cluster resource schema

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Type: String

Maximum Length: 32  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String

Required: Yes

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: Name of a Cluster. You can use any non-white space character in the name
Name.markdownDescription:
Name of a Cluster. You can use any non-white space character in the name

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64

ClusterArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.
ClusterArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048

Read only property: Yes

Status.description: Deployment status of a resource. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
